title: ‘QAnon Shaman’ Jacob Chansley Sentenced to 41 Months in Prison
sub_head: Judge imposes stiff sentence after defendant gives speech referencing Gandhi, ‘Shawshank Redemption’
body:
WASHINGTON—Jacob Chansley, the self-described “QAnon Shaman” photographed at the Jan. 6 riot wearing a Viking hat with fur and horns, was sentenced to more than three years in prison Wednesday by a federal judge who said he believed Mr. Chansley showed genuine remorse but his actions at the Capitol were too horrific to prescribe lesser punishment.
“Obstructing the functioning of the government is the type of conduct that is so serious that I cannot justify” less time than sentencing guidelines recommend, U.S. District Judge Royce Lamberth said, imposing a 41-month sentence.
